question_text: Why would a technician choose to alternate between different tone patterns during cable tracing?
answer_options: To force switch ports into spanning-tree mode
To differentiate between multiple tone sources on nearby cables
To increase the signalâ€™s frequency for fiber detection
correct_answer: To differentiate between multiple tone sources on nearby cables
explanation: Many tone generators allow switching between distinct audio patterns so technicians can identify multiple cables independently without confusion.
